job_tasks.phrase: design, develop, test, secure & deploy services from planning to production.

job_tasks.justification: This refers to the standard methodologies and practices within software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Design and implement the infrastructure of the system.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves the foundational engineering work for a system's architecture.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deploy machine learning models and AI algorithms to extract insights, automate tasks, and improve decision-making processes.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions the development and deployment of ML models and AI algorithms, which falls under model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Optimize application performance, scalability, and cost efficiency through continuous monitoring and optimization of serverless resources.
job_tasks.justification: This describes operational tasks related to maintaining and improving deployed services, including monitoring and optimization.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide technical leadership and mentorship to junior team members, sharing knowledge and best practices to foster a culture of learning and innovation.
job_tasks.justification: Providing technical leadership and mentorship is a core software engineering responsibility, often associated with senior roles.

job_tasks.phrase: Explore new technologies and tools to keep us using cutting-edge solutions
job_tasks.justification: While related to learning, the context of exploring technologies to improve the platform's solutions aligns with software engineering innovation and adoption.

job_tasks.phrase: Participate in continuous and iterative engineering cycles with an emphasis on code quality, supportability, scalability, and performance.
job_tasks.justification: This describes participation in the software development lifecycle with a focus on key engineering principles.

soft_skills.phrase: The team works in full collaboration with security architects, product managers, and other development teams.
soft_skills.justification: This highlights the importance of teamwork and collaboration with various stakeholders.

soft_skills.phrase: Provide technical leadership and mentorship to junior team members, sharing knowledge and best practices to foster a culture of learning and innovation.
soft_skills.justification: Providing technical leadership and fostering innovation are aspects of ownership and driving technical direction.

soft_skills.phrase: Explore new technologies and tools to keep us using cutting-edge solutions
soft_skills.justification: This indicates a need for continuous learning and adaptation to new technologies.

profile.rationale: The job ad emphasizes core software engineering tasks (1.A.1) such as designing, developing, testing, securing, and deploying services, as well as implementing infrastructure and participating in agile cycles. While it mentions developing and deploying machine learning models and AI algorithms (1.B.1), this is presented as a feature to be integrated into the platform rather than the primary focus of the role. The technologies listed (AWS serverless, Python) are common in software engineering. The role's description as a 'Senior Software Engineer' for a 'SaaS Platform' further supports this, with AI/ML being a component of the platform rather than the sole or primary focus. Therefore, the role is best classified as an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the core responsibilities being software engineering for a SaaS platform, with AI/ML development being one of the tasks within that broader scope. The title and the majority of the described tasks align well with the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile.
